meanings.definition: A yellowish substance produced by glands in the ear canal.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used a tool to clean the earwax from my ear.
meanings.sent2: I learned that earwax helps protect the ear from dust and dirt.
meanings.sent3: My sister thought earwax was like nature's way of giving us a built-in ear cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The earwax in his ear was as stubborn as a rock, refusing to budge.
meanings.sent5: The candle maker used earwax to create unique, scented candles.

meanings.definition: To remove earwax from the ear canal.
meanings.sent1: I gently earwaxed my ear after showering to keep it clean.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised me to never use cotton swabs to earwax.
meanings.sent3: My cat seemed to enjoy watching me earwax, finding it oddly fascinating.
meanings.sent4: She felt relieved after earwaxing her ears, feeling like a weight had been lifted.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the rain helped earwax away the worries of the day.
